column1: #Text=Single phase polycrystalline [TPrA][Mn(dca)3] was prepared from aqueous solution at ambient temperature as reported36.

#Text=All reagents were commercially available and were used as purchased without further purification: Mn(NO3)2 \ xH2O (97%, Aldrich), (TPrA)Br (98%, Aldrich), Na(dca) (96%, Aldrich), and absolute ethanol (Panreac).
#Text=Also, a reagent amount of deionized water was used in the synthesis.
#Text=A mixture of (TPrA)Br (2 mmol) solution in ethanol (10 ml) and a solution of Na(dca) (6 mmol) in water (10 ml) was layered on top of an aqueous solution of Mn(NO3)2 \ xH2O (2 mmol).
#Text=Colourless polycrystalline powder was obtained and collected by filtration and washed several times with ethanol.
